github.adeo88.groupme.api

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • github.adeo88.groupme.api.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A User contains information about the user on a global scale in the GroupMeAPI.
    Author:
    adeo8

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long created_at
      Time this User was originally created in the Unix epoch format, which is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 in the UTC (GMT) timezone.
      java.lang.String email
      The email address associated with this User.
      java.lang.String image_url
      The URL for this User's Avatar.
      java.lang.String phone_number
      The phone number associated with this User.
      boolean sms
      Flag indicating whether this User is in sms mode.
      long updated_at
      Time this User was last updated in the Unix epoch format, which is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 in the UTC (GMT) timezone.
      java.lang.String user_id
      The user_id of this User.

    • Field Detail

      • user_id

        public java.lang.String user_id
        The user_id of this User. Should always be present.

      • phone_number

        public java.lang.String phone_number
        The phone number associated with this User. May be null.

      • image_url

        public java.lang.String image_url
        The URL for this User's Avatar. May be null if user has not set an Avatar yet.

      • created_at

        public long created_at
        Time this User was originally created in the Unix epoch format, which is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 in the UTC (GMT) timezone.

      • updated_at

        public long updated_at
        Time this User was last updated in the Unix epoch format, which is the number of seconds since January 1, 1970 in the UTC (GMT) timezone.

      • email

        public java.lang.String email
        The email address associated with this User. May be null.

      • sms

        public boolean sms
        Flag indicating whether this User is in sms mode.

    • Method Detail

      • Me

        public static User Me(github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeAPI api)
               throws github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeException
        Constructs a User associated with the application token in the GroupMeAPI.
        Parameters:
        api - The GroupMeAPI to use.
        Returns:
        User corresponding to this api's token.
        Throws:
        github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeException - When there is a JSON error or Networking error.

      • update

        public static int update(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> avatar_url,
                         java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> name,
                         java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> email,
                         java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> zip_code,
                         github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeAPI api)
                  throws github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeException
        Updates the users account with the new information provided. The avatar_url, name, email, and zip_code can be set.
        Parameters:
        avatar_url - Optional string in WWW URL format
        name - Optional string
        email - Optional string in an email format (Ex: tmp@fake.com)
        zip_code - Optional string representing the zip code
        api - GroupMeAPI containing the token of the required user.
        Returns:
        HTTP status code returned from the server (200: OK)
        Throws:
        github.adeo88.groupme.api.GroupMeException

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Turns this User into a readable string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String representation of this User.
